titles.title: Arise And Sing Ye Children Of Zion

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Arise and sing, ye children of Zion,
For the Lord has delivered thee;
Arise and sing, ye children of Zion,
For the Lord has delivered thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Open up your hearts and rejoice before Him,
Open up your hearts and rejoice before Him,
Open up your hearts and rejoice before Him,
For the King is our God.
